scripts.docker:build:dev: yarn compile:clear && yarn compile && yarn copy:sequelize:config && docker build -f Dockerfile.dev -t gapp/backend-dev .
scripts.docker:build:test: yarn compile:clear && yarn compile && yarn copy:sequelize:config && docker build -f Dockerfile.test -t gapp/backend-test .
scripts.docker:build: yarn compile:clear && yarn compile && yarn copy:sequelize:config && docker build -t gapp-backend-api .
